mapper.select: select l.lecture_no, lecture_name, lecture_description, lecture_afreecaid, l.regdate, user_no, class_status from ds_lecture l LEFT OUTER JOIN ds_class_list c on l.lecture_no = c.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lecture_no}

select a.user_no, user_id, user_name from (select l.lecture_no, user_no from ds_lecture l , ds_class_list c WHERE l.lecture_no = c.lecture_no and l.lecture_no=#{lecture_no} and class_status='true') a, ds_user u where a.user_no=u.user_no
